name: Triumph Tribute
description:
In a distant realm, 5 heroes were walking in a dense forest, looking forward to their next adventure together. Everything was fine until something very strange happens…

Play to find out, and help our heroes to survive while facing a very dark secret.

Commands:
  • Movement - AWSD
  • Open Chests - Mouse right button
  • Minigames - Mouse left button
Changelog:
  • 1.5  - Fixed inventory bug (appearing during combat and not displaying the dead characters)
  • 1.4  - Fixed health bar bug and minor adjusts
  • 1.3 - Fixed Reset bug and minor adjusts
  • 1.2 - Fixed paladin bug
  • 1.1 -  Fixed UI Bug
  • 1.0 - Game Launch
